name: Staybridge Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was huge, with a perfectly equipped kitchen. Everything looked new and well conserved. The bed was amazingly comfortable. The manager's reception, a complementary service, is a very nice gift.
reviews.title: Absolutely spotless

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff was nice and helpful and the breakfast was great.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011
reviews.text: 100% advisable, if I ever go back to Liverpool I'll go back there with no hesitation.
reviews.title: The Best Place To Stay in Liverpool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is marketed as Serviced Apartments and has a nice secure car park on the ground floor, beneath the hotel. However, at £8 a day it needs to be. The staff on reception are very friendly and helpful and the whole place was spotlessly clean.
reviews.title: Great place but.............

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lack of a room information pack was very frustrating. In a room so well equipped with kit-n'-stuff, a room pack would have made trying to make it all work, so much easier. Most annoying was the lack of instructions for the air-conditioning. The unit is not at all easy to understand. We found out by trial and error that you need to press the TEST button to switch the darned thing off. There was also no instructions how to get connected to the free WiFi.
reviews.title: Great concept, minor niggles

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great concept of an apartment in a hotel - and very stylish too. Top of the range service as well - and minutes from the city centre.
reviews.title: Great hotel and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here on a trip to celebrate our wedding anniversary, and couldn't have asked for better value or a more comfortable stay. The suite was spacious and well equipped, and the bed was one of the most comfortable we have ever slept in. With a great location next to Albert Dock and within easy walking distance of the town centre, Staybridge Suites is an excellent choice for any type of stay in Liverpool – we'd definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Excellent value in excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent three nights at the Staybridge and were very impressed. The room was modern, comfortable and well equipped. The location near Albert Dock was perfect - only a short walk into city centre, but close to Beatles Museum and other riverside attractions. Tip: Bistro Jacques on Hardman Street has excellent food and a great deal on Tuesday evening (Two courses and a bottle of wine for £11.95)
reviews.title: great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Staybridge Suites in May. The room was fantastic and included a small kitchenette which was really useful. The hotel is located by the Albert Docks and it isonly a 5 minute walk to the docks which includes the Tate Modern and National Maritime Museum. We also bought a £4.40 Merseyside travel card and went to Southport .On the return we visited the Anthony Gormley statues. We had a fantastic few days and I would highly recommend the hotel. We are going back on 23rd August.
reviews.title: Excellent value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Front of house staff friendly and ready to offer any assistance needed. Comfortable hotel and beats the Liverpool Crowne Plaza hands down and in every way. Breakfast each day and Manager's Reception 3 nights a week were excellent. Views from some of the rooms are poor (but then it's a city) and plumbing wasn't 100% but again, staff were quick to deal with any issues and nothing was too much bother for them. Much handier position than the Crowne Plaza, for wherever you want to visit. We would thoroughly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel - beats the Liverpool Crowne Plaza!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Certainly a great concept, seemingly not offered in many british hotels. The public areas and suites were spotlessly clean. I have stayed here a few times now, in both the regular and the one bedroom suites. Apart from the two rooms of course, the main difference is a shower only in the regular suites and a bath with a shower over it in the one bedroom suites. Kitchen facilities are identical. For this concept you might have though baths would be ideal in all the suites?
reviews.title: Fantastic Concept

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: All suites only offer a kingsize bed, but the sofa does fold out into a second bed for those travelling with friends.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel, perfect for what we wanted

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: "The Pantry" is next to reception where you can purchase groceries at convenience store prices. (Although there is a Tesco Metro in the city centre!)
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel really enjoyed my stay there

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Breakfast is included and it is similar to the Holiday Inn Express type with a the usual cerals, bread, fruit and 3 alternating hot dishes. The milk and orange juice are kept in a large fridge and you serve yourself as if you were at home!
reviews.title: loved our stay definately be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The is an coffee/tea machine with is actually available all day. The managers reception is only Mon-Thurs, I have only stayed at weekends so have not tried this as yet.
reviews.title: Beatlemania

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Luxury apartment in the heart of Liverpool with a large double bed and a double sofa bed. Perfect size for 2, 3 or 4 guests. Fully equipped with ensuite bathroom and kitchen. Apartment was very quiet with no loud revellers.
reviews.title: Excellent would use it again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Situated at Albert dock directly opposite Tourist Information, Big Wheel, and the Beatles Museum. Only a few minutes walk from the shopping district, Tate Liverpool and the bars and clubs.
reviews.title: Just fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011
reviews.text: Eat at Jamie's Italian ( they don't take bookings so be prepared to wait at the bar at busy times)
reviews.title: Stupendous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Drink at Alma D Cuba (very popular will probably have to que)
reviews.title: Where's the maple syrup

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Dance at Heebie Jeebies (good mix of clientele great outdoor smoking area great music ranging from disco to soul to indie)
reviews.title: Loved it & would definitely recommend!

description: Staybridge Suites is an all-suite, non-smoking, extended-stay hotel that caters to guests looking for just one night, one week or longer. Whether relocating to the area, on a project, in training, or in need of a Serviced Apartment Staybridge Suites Liverpool is the ideal place to stay for temporary housing. Staybridge Suites, Liverpool is located on the famous Kings Waterfront, opposite the ECHO Arena, BT Convention Centre and Albert Docks, the largest collection of Grade 1 listed buildings in the UK, also home to The Beatles Story, Tate Liverpool and Maritime Museum. To compliment this, just a 10 minute walk is the newly opened Liverpool One boasting 42 acres of shopping and leisure. Staybridge Suites offer 2 types of suites: Studio and One-Bedroom, Most Suites have a River View. All suites are furnished; containing a fully equipped kitchen, living room area, work space, FLAT SCREEN TV with cable/movies, and FREE Wi-Fi Internet . Hotel amenities include 24-HR Service, complimentary breakfast and evening receptions (Mon-Thurs), newspaper, business center, fitness room, Priority Club Rewards and free guest laundry.
